titleStmt.title: Good manners for schools, or, A paraphrase upon qui mihi, &c. Done into English verse by O. Dykes, for the use of the grammar-school at the Academy in Chancery-Lane.
titleStmt.author: Dykes, Oswald, 1670?-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J[ames]. Rawlins, for John Place at Furnivals-Inn-gate in Holborn,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Boys, that wou'd scholars be, your minds dispose".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
